# Vulpkanin
The Vulpkanin (vulp-ka-nin) are a race of humanoid canine-like beings.
They natively speak the Canilunzt language.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- Their claws do Slash and Blunt damage. - Their fur makes them able to withstand cold environments better than other species. - They can eat and drink 50% faster. - They take 30% less Cold damage.
## Special
- Comes with the Deuteranopia trait by default. This can be disabled via accessibility options. - Capable of tracking scents found on the clothes and items of other people.
## Drawbacks
- They take [color=#ffa500]30% more Heat damage[/color] and remain on fire for longer. - They get hungrier 25% faster than an average Human. - They are sensitive to flashes, and may suffer eye damage from them.
